column4: Hello, does anyone think that Haory is good choice for a laptop ? ( its 366 MHz with 160 MB ram)
Bah
xfce is newer than blackbox, right?
is Ndiswrapper available with Ubuntu?
yes, read the faq
http://www.ubuntulinux.org/support/documentation/howto/ndiswrapper
no
oh?
how would that work?  the kernel loses all state between boots.
you edit /boot/grub/menu.lst AFTER reading the comments in that file
Hmm, because when I boot up the Live CD, I have to type in this in the boot parameters: "noapic nolapic pci=noacpi"
how could editing /prc/cmdline ever work then, if it's booting off a read-only cd? ;)
Ah yeah, i mean, when I have it installed.
(note, you can't install off the livecd)
So, when I install it, how do I make sure that these boot parameters: "noapic nolapic pci=noacpi" are there everytime I boot up the LiveCD.
er?  if you installed it, why are you using the livecd?
What do you mean by AFTER reading the comments?
Do I have to do that?
of course, or you'll break it
Can't I pass those command line parameters during the installation so they are there by default?
I don't know
Damn, okay.  Going back to the LiveCD now.
no
yes, i saw that coming.
